 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרַח‎</span>] **verb** ==make bald, or a baldness==, usually (by mourners) for the dead, compare Rs<sup>Semitic i. 306, 2nd ed. 324</sup> (Arabic parallels) (Late Hebrew ***id.*** Hiph\`il ***shew baldness***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***wound, make sores***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***whiteness in face*** of horse (but <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be bald***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bald***); Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***make bald*** (rare); Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְרַח‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, chiefly derivatives (and derived Meanings); compare Sinaitic proper name, masculine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קרחה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קרחו‎</span>; [[BDB#MI|MI]]<sup>3.21.24.25</sup> proper name, of a location <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קרחה‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְרְחוּ קָרְחָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּראִשָׁם‎</span> [[Lev.21.5|Lev 21:5]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (&gt; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יקרחה‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְגַלֵּ֑חוּ‎</span> compare [[Deut.14.1|Deut 14:1]]); ***Imperative*** feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָרְחִי וָגֹ֫זִּי עַל‎</span> [[Mic.1.16|Mic 1:16]] ***make a baldness... for.*** **Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקָּרֵחַ לָהֶם‎</span> [[Jer.16.6|Jer 16:6]] men ***shall*** not ***make themselves bald for them***. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 plural consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְהִקְרִיחוּ אֵלַיִח קָרְחָה‎</span> [[Ezek.27.31|Ezek 27:31]] ***and they shall make a baldness*** (compare **Qal&gt;**) ***for thee***. **Hoph\`al** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּלרֿאִשׁ מֻקְרָח‎</span> [[Ezek.29.18|Ezek 29:18]] ***every head made bald*** (by carrying load).
